scripts.prepare:full: bun install:all && bun scripts/check-env-exists.ts && bun env:sync && bun db:full
scripts.install:all: cd apps/web && bun i && cd ../worker && bun i && cd ../../packages/database && bun i
scripts.env:sync: cp .env apps/web/.env && cp .env apps/worker/.env && cp .env packages/database/.env
scripts.web:dev: bun env:sync && cd apps/web && bun dev
scripts.worker:dev: bun env:sync && cd apps/worker && bun dev
